values:
soo i guess i should write.. so heres a lil update with me...

i just been working and school but lately i have been sick..=( but everything that was stressing me out before is now gone and ima good again.. thank-goodness that wasnt cool... yeah for alll who didnt know i had pre-cancer cells that would lead into cervical cancer... but i have an operation and am all better=)

ummm lately well mostly today i have been missing the memories of the past.. and i know they are gone and today is the present and i can make new memories but the years of memories that i have with my friends and family i miss those... when i was younger and would laugh for hours almost pee my pants over nothing.. but yeah i just wish i could have more of those days with my friends that we would have fun doing nothing at all=( or playing basketballl..  I also think its funny how people u thought were ur friends actually show their real shady character when things happen.. but again there are friends who would do anything for u when something goes down.. and for that i heart u guys more then anything..

right now i should be at the school but i dunno.. i dont think a teacher is what i would like to be now... its weird cuz when i was planning my courses for the winter term i realized.. " is this what i really want to do for the rest of my life?" 

has everyone had a day or something where they just wonder what if i didnt' ..... or what if i changed so and so.. cuz i am kinda feeling like that... i mean what if i didnt move out of rez, would i be as happy as i was? i dont know its just something i consider, if i am making the right choices in life.....

<3

love love love love love love

you were everything i wanted

you were everything a girl could be

then you left me broken hearted

now you dont mean a thing to me

all i wanted was your

love love love love love love

hate is a strong word but i really really really dont like you

now thats its over i dont even know what i liked about you

brought you around and you just brought me down

hate is a strong word but i really really really dont like you

i really dont like you

thought that everything was perfect

isnt that how its suppose to be

thought you thought i was worth it

now i think a little differently

all i wanted was your

now that its over you cant hurt me

now that its over you cant bring me down

soooo whats new with me? umm nuttin just had a break down a couples nights ago i dunno whhy but it felt uber good.. lol but on the good side of things the coach from the RDC queens basketball has called me and wants me to come to a Camp.. and ima sooo excited cuz in highschool when i was playing balll nothing else mattered....... basketball was my anti-stress thing and awww i miss ball soo much<333333 all the good times and friends and the tournies and aghhh the memories<3333

i thought it was about time for an update... ummm ima still tryin to decided what courses i wanna take.. cuz i know if ima play ball i dont wanna take 5 hard courses.. cuz the stress of work... school and then ball... welll no stress with ball but yeahhh there will be no fun timme lol but yeah its all good i dont wanna get out of college soo fast soo its iight cuz school was soo much funnn but yeahh its all good=D i tthinkin i might get rid of one of my classes cuz i alread have 5 sooo 4 is good for me lol 


OOoO ima also excited for tonite cuz One tree hill is back on tonite i think theres only 6 or 4 more shows left for this season.. *tear* lol but yeahhh thats pretty much what ima doing tonite lol wow i have no life oOoo and i might be babysitin my crazy nephew on friday after i get off work woot woot

welll my lil update information is here.. sooo lets get down to business... welll finally things are starting to work out for me.. *glares* about damn time... i mean i have been jobless for two weeks and now finally i found something that i might actually like and its not retail yayyyy *grooves* The job is a part-time circulation clerk... i know its part-time but for part-time ima likin the pay<33 lol and they are working about my times that i need off and its super sweet... ima excited.. soo well i start that on monday my shift is 12pm til 8:30pm woot woot then wed to friday 9am til 4pm ima glad<33

school life... welll school planning is around the corner.. i gotta start lookin at classes that i wanna take and if they will go with the program that im in.. and i have a meetin with academic advisor on the 16th of april.. so thats all with school for now.. but i really dont wanna plan my courses.... its not fun at all lol its kinda stressfull not really but it gives me headaches lol

i been seeing my nephew a lot lately now too awww he's getting sooo big its crazyy i was babysitin him last night and yeah i took a couple pics of him and such i think ima post themm <333 with his big blue eyes and long eyelashes... so pretty lol

oOo this weekend is st. patty's day on saturday soo its time to get intoxicated like a mo fo.. and i hope everyone has a safe but uber fun weekend.. <33

much <333

Ummmm okay update with melly's life.. (sit back and relax)

so this is whats new with me... I quit Latitude (finally) well i gave me two weeks on feb 12 lol woot woot and my last day there was feb26th and now ima kinda jobless lol its alright but i feel like a bumm but yeah ima glad that ima not there anymore cuz now i wont have random people coming up to me and asking "Whats going on with Sasha and ur brother" *glares* but yeah thats that..

um today i had an interview at the mall but it wasnt retail or anything like that lol woot woot soo i hope i did well.. i will get the news at 4ish todayy *crosses fingers* but yeahhh i hope that everything goes good with that if not then mehh gotta keep on swimming *heheh finding nemo* but yeah ima hungry ima thinkin about making mac and cheese but ima lazy as well and hungry melly and lazy melly dont mix well but anywho enough with that..

ummm what should i do this weekend? besides catch up on sleep.. i kinda think somethings wrong with me cuz lately i been having super bad headaches and tummy pains and randomly get dizzy its weirdd and i wanna go to the doctors but i dunno its not the same here like it is in fort nelson<33  but yeahhh enough with that as well

  i duno what else to sayy soo ima done with the update of melly's "Awesome" life  and now i leave u with some Hellogoodbye lyrics<333 because hellogoodbye is loveee

Much <333

ummm so i guess its time for an updatee=D i dont got a lot to say but there is news to be said lol sooo this is the downlow with me and my life..
i got my lip pierced... its not a ring soo yeah i think it looks cute and its on the right side of my bottom lip its cute.. but right now its kinda all fat its funny to drink anything lol Ooo Lisa (gurl i work with) and i got our lips pierced lol we were planning it for a while lol and we finally did lol she got the middle of her lip done it looks good on her too.. u cant really notice it tho soo yeah i guess thats all good OoOO 
i went and saw snoop dogg and ice cube , it was a okay concert mehh i already saw snoop dogg before soo that was mehh but ice cube that was pimp<33  
OOO soo the other night i got a call from peter which was weird cuz i havent talked to him in a long time face to face and on the phone but throught text and msn its iight but yeah so i guess he moved to Sylvan Lake..thats awesome i like that cuz hes a good friend of mine and now i have someone else to hang out with and i know he;ll go out with me to the bars and shit yayyyyyyy since jess and kiki lefted me.. *glares at them* ooo *shakes fist* but yeahhhh and how i was like i miss my boys well now i have one of them here lol oOo and i also have a plan to kiddnapp kIkI and justin lol soo then i will be all good<3

soo i wanna go to the parkland mall right now but ima lazy and i dont wanna go by myself=(( lol but my brother is gonna call me in a bit to go for a drink or something awww jakob is coming back less then 2 weeks yayyyyy my lil nephew i miss him lol its funny cuz i guess my mom was telling him not to climb on the couch and he got all mad and stuck out his tongue at her lmao hahahaha i didnt teach him that... *looks away* 

oOOo soo the whole going back to school thing is a must do.. i really miss going to college.. lol i know but yeah work is mehh and there's wayyyyyyyyy too much drama in the work fields and school not much drama but its all good lol and i would rather be getting my degree instead of workin right now so yeah its all good like that but i think ima go and watch tv for a bit maybe go to the mall if i choose too..

Much Love<333
Melly

ummm welll this is how ima feeling and it blows cuz its almost christmas and it really doesnt feel like it.. maybe cuz its my first christmas awayy from fort nelson... and my parents.. but my parents are coming here TOMORROWW!! ima looking forward to that even tho i gotta work 1 til 9 tomorrow night and then on friday i gotta work 3-11pm.. its pretty gay damn late night shopping lol *shakes fist* i think it doesnt feel like christmas cuz ima getting too old and ima not wirh my friends and family in fort nelson... i dunno wha else it could be but this blows lol thats all i gotta say about that... soo i have decided ima quit latitude a while ago  cuz its starting to not be fun and ima gonna go back to school and get my degree faster.,... meh i know ima still young and all that i wanna travel and see places but yeahhh i wanna do soo much but is there enough time? time has been flying by sooo fast.. its F'in crazy.. 
but i guess i better start puttin my mascara on my brother, Jakob, and lyndon are gonna be here soon to go hang out at the mall lol ima only going to hang out with jakob loll shhhh =)

much love<3 and maybe my feelings will change about christmas as soon as my parents get here<3

sooo ima going to the snopp dogg and ice cube concert jan 19<33 and then the next day is my nephew's 2nd birthdayy awww hes getting sooo big.. i love how whenever he sees me he gets sooo happy and then trys to show off haha 
how cant u love that.. soo when my parents come here for christmas i will be going out to sylvan lake to stay at my brothers house and spend some time with the family at christmas .. its crazy cuz this is gonna be the first christmas 
that ima not in fort nelson... like my first birthday away from the parents.. but that wasnt the greatest day.. but since they are coming here maybe christmas will be a gooder .. i noticed that christmas and all other holidays arent the 
same i wish i was younger so i could actually enjoy these times
but meh what can u do.. so other then that i just have been working alot and sitting on the couch watchin one tree hill and americas next top model woot woot
its some good times.. ummm thats about it...<333


You almost always pick the best times
To drop the worst lines
You almost made me cry again this time
Another false alarm
Red flashing lights
Well this time I'm not going to watch myself die
I think I made it a game to play your game
And let myself cry
I buried myself alive on the inside
So I could shut you out
And let you go away for a long time

(Chorus)
I guess it's okay I puked the day away
I guess it's better you trapped yourself in your own way
And if you want me back 
You're gonna have to ask


I think the chain broke away
And I felt it the day that I had my own time.
I took advantage of myself and felt fine
But it was worth the night
I caught an early flight and I made it home

(Repeat Chorus)
Nicer than that (2x)

With my foot on your neck
I finally have you
Right where I want you (4x)

(repeat chorus)
Nicer than that

I guess it's okay I puked the day away. (Nicer than that)
I guess it's better you trapped yourself in your own way.(Nicer then that)
And if you want me back, 
You're gonna have to ask 
Nicer than that
Nicer!
Nicer!

Hahaha thats right ima listenin to james blunt<33 he reminds me of latitude and soo thats happy thought<3 but yeahh whats new with me?
nuttin much just been working and chilling out... OoO i went out for last night last thursday with some people that i work with.. i had a blast
i know i gotta do that alot more now.. well not really alot but more then i did before >=) hahah great funnn ima getting sick.. OOo heres some
news my parents are coming here for christmas i dunnoo if i wrote that already but yeahhh welll they are coming down and ima sooo HAPPY!!! 
and my shady baby is coming woot wooot <33 OOo jakob is getting so big now!! its unreal hes the cutest thing ever<333 lol i guess he was up 
in fort nelson and he saw a picture of me and was pointing at it and saying AUNTIE AUNTIE<333 yayyyyy sometimes i just wish for a better time</3
Did I disappoint you or let you down?
Should I be feeling guilty or let the judges frown?
'Cause I saw the end before we'd begun,
Yes I saw you were blinded and I knew I had won.
So I took what's mine by eternal right.
Took your soul out into the night.
It may be over but it won't stop there,
I am here for you if you'd only care.
You touched my heart you touched my soul.
You changed my life and all my goals.
And love is blind and that I knew when,
My heart was blinded by you.
I've kissed your lips and held your head.
Shared your dreams and shared your bed.
I know you well, I know your smell.
I've been addicted to you.

Goodbye my lover.
Goodbye my friend.
You have been the one.
You have been the one for me.(x2)

I am a dreamer but when I wake,
You can't break my spirit - it's my dreams you take.
And as you move on, remember me,
Remember us and all we used to be
I've seen you cry, I've seen you smile.
I've watched you sleeping for a while.
I'd be the father of your child.
I'd spend a lifetime with you.
I know your fears and you know mine.
We've had our doubts but now we're fine,
And I love you, I swear that's true.
I cannot live without you.

Goodbye my lover.
Goodbye my friend.
You have been the one.
You have been the one for me.(x2)

And I still hold your hand in mine.
In mine when I'm asleep.
And I will bear my soul in time,
When I'm kneeling at your feet.

Goodbye my lover.
Goodbye my friend.
You have been the one.
You have been the one for me.(x2)

I'm so hollow, baby, I'm so hollow.
I'm so, I'm so, I'm so hollow.(x2)

time for an update.. this is just to let me vent out all this crapp on my chest right now... prepare.. sit back and feell the love i felt today..
GRRR omfg!! parents are soo fuckin retarded!!! like seriously, i knew she wouldnt let me live my life... i know she thinks shes tryin to help me.. but bitchin at ur kid doesnt fuckin help!!! and then with my brother just to come here i hope he understands what i wanna do i want to travel.. i want to see the world... ima still young i dont need to go to school right away it would be nice to get my bachelor's at a young age but thats not me.. like she said ima young i should b havin funn and thats what ima going to do with takin a year off from school! she doesnt understand and then she tries to throw in my face about my scholarships and thats free money and all that crapp on how i cant get a job with a grade 12 education.. i wanted to throw things in her face like at least ima not cleanin rooms and shit.. at least i got some college education and i can say i do have my grade 12 and i gradded with honors... can she say any of that.. i fucking think not!!!  ima go tanning and cool down=D bye

ummm time for an update i guess...
being 19 kinda blows.. lol i mean u gotta pay bills be "mature" like fuckkk lol who does that.. =) i wanna be 18 again that was a good year good good good umm soo the carnival is here and i went last night and hung out with kiki for a bit.. but mehh its not the same i need people who actually wanna go on the cool rides with me not the crappy none fun rides mhmm ummm yeahhhh i got nothing else.. ooo wait.. i dont work at zeller no mores YYAYYYYY lol i work at Latitude it's iight for now i guess until i find something else.. i mean i worked yesturday and i was soo bored lol maybe its a sign i shouldnt deal with clothes cuz thats not my thing... but yess umm we will find out and give it a couple of days.. maybe i'll get used to it.. =D or not.. 

much <33

9 Days<33 and its my birthdayy OoOOooO me gonna be oldd hahaha sooo what's new with me? nuttin much so i think ima going to fort nelson sometime in july but ima not to sure when yet.. i know i gotta stay here in red deer for july 19-22 cuz of the fair woot woot lol =D but yeahhh thats all i got... 

9 days bitches remember that.. July 5th

Trying to keep my mind off u so tryin to stay busy busy busy =D woot woot

UmmM welll i had a busy weekend and i didnt even have to workkk wooot work free weekend but however this is how my weekend went.. friday i went to school, then went to work until 9:30 i was super tired so i passed out lol and then saturday i helped my friend move into his new apartment with a couple other peoples and that night we went to see BUCKCHERRY woot woot... the opening band that played before them was pretty good too. i got to talk to them.. i asked if they were on myspace lmaoo yeah shutup ima dork like that haha lol but yeah they are but its not a good song that they have on there.. lol soo yeah =( but that band that opened for Buckcherry was Edge City Outlaws.  UmM the concert was done at 11 so we went to Aaron's house and drank lol a 40. of Spice rum lol welll we were playing drinkin games and since brittany is preggo she drank pepsi and lol the guys teamed up on me lol sooo it was like for every drink they took i had to take two lmao it was funny lol cuz i wasnt drunkkk lol wooot go me lol but then i drank too fast becuz they are butts lol and my tummy started to hurt but after like 10 mins it was all good again.. lol yayyyy =D booze was funnn lol and yeahhhh it doesnt seem like a busy weekend but i also did a lil bit of homework.. and i am finished school for this term next friday on the 16th and i dont think i gotta work that weekend.. sooo i just gotta say now that, that weekend is gonna be funn hopefully.. OoO another thing.. the concert was at the Catwalk (which is one of the bars here in R.D) it felt like i havent been to those bars in a long time and i missed themm lol i was happy but after the concert we didnt stay for bar hours we just went to aaron's, that was iight i guess but i need friends who dont smoke lol and arent preggoo lol KIKI HURRY UP AND GET BACK HEREE ima going crazy lol u and me are gonna go out grooving lol i have decided this lol 

Australia? what to do? save money work work work and save money work all summer and maybe not go to schoool in the fall and just work? umm planning all that crap out soo i can go and go overseas.. =O

but yeah thats all i got for right now... ima go and get some food before i gotta go to workk...

Much <33

ooOoo well its time for another update... umm so here's whats been going on with me.. life is meh right now.. it could be soo much better without people bitchy at everything i do... or anything i have thoughts about.. i mean ima big gurl now... (no its not a fat joke.. not yet.. lol) but yeah i can make my own choices i know what i want in life and ima not gonna mess that up.. loook at me.. for one ima in college, and will be in college/university for 6 years until i get my degree and then get a great job being a physical education teacher/english teacher somewhere in the states or somewhere... i graduated highschool with a "A" average and with 4 scholarships pretty much, i am into sports and not drugs.. i hardly drink anymore.. i mean what else do i gotta do just to prove to u that ima smart..... smarter then u would really know... i do listen but i gotta make choices on my own.. ur not always gonna be here to make the choices for me.. i gotta learn on my own... and this is how ima going to do it.. 

Right now ima attending college still i stayed for the spring term to get another class in.. and that i didnt wanna go back to fn.. (but again who could blame me) ummm yeahhh i just really need to vent right now... but i know what i am doing just believe me.. if i fall then i falll i will only pick myself up again and start something new...=D whoa.. i sound all grown up and shit.. this is scary loll whoa.. has melly become mature? *looks around* mehhh who knows.. but yeahhh thats all i needed to do ima go to sleep now 
much <33333

Ummm i guess its time for another update... lets see whats been going on with me.. i just been startin my new term OOO and i gotta job.. *gasps* lol yeahhh its for the cosmtics part time lol but i pretty much get 7 hours all the timme soo thats pretty coool and its $10.00per hour soo yeah... and its pretty much the same thing as i did at pharmasave welll before i went to receiving... but yeahh =D Ummm i been babysiting, and just chillin out... since all my peoples lefted me.. 
haha the other day i was walkin home from work and this guy who was a bouncer at one of the bars waved and i didnt know who the hell it was.. and then he pulled up beside me and he was like "DEREK'S SISTER" lol OoO soo thats how ima known lol woot woot but yeah then he gave me a ride home lol yeahh i was like whoa.. i actually know people that live here.. Ooo red deer isnt a city! lol but he asked me why i havent been to the bar lately and i told him it was becuz i have no friends here.. well i do... but the chicks i hang out with are preggo and the guys ummm lol no comment lol =D

ummm ima tired but ima waitin for Pizza 73.. *drooolz*
today was ummm okay i guess.. could of been sooo much better with the not getting bitched at first thing this morning then again after class... wooo..=| just cuz parents dont live around u.. doesnt mean ur not gonna get bitched at... they will always find a wayyy its a parent thing i guess.... =| but yeahh thats all i pretty much got right now.. OOo i gotta work tomorrow 9 til 4.... not bad but friday i work 2 til 9:30 woot woot.. i think ima go out on saturday night ummm with who i dunno yet.. but i need to get drunnkkkkkkkkkkk lol its been a whille.. *tear runs down cheek* lol jk=P but ima header...

Much <333

Ummmmm well its been a while since i last posted something about my life and what i been upto.. welll here goes nothing.. the winter term is done and now i dont go back to school until may 2nd... lol and this term is only for a month.. woot woot.. lol but its all good cuz i only have one class three times a week and ima done by 1 every monday, wednesday and friday =D  so since this term is ending ima movin into a new dorm.. but jessica and i went to check it out and ewww it smells like old man... =| i think ima die loll but yeah it needs melly's touch lol yess.... ummm

other then that all i been doing is hangin out with my friends before they leave me.. lookin for an apartment.. (no luck) grrr and went out a couple of times.. lol OoOo and babysittin my nephew jaKob.. too cute<33 and of course going on random bus adventures with jess where we never know where we are gonna end up... its super fun lol i loves it<333

Jessica and I have decided that we are stayin here in red deer instead of going back to fort nelson i mean there's nothing there and here.. omg lol soo much to do and its always soo much funn i loves it.. cuz there's so many lil towns by red deer and its in the middle of Edmonton and Calgary... woot woot.. concerts anyone? heck yeahh.. swollen members are gonna be here this friday and i dont really like them but i might goo.. lol but ima tryin for the no lol cuz i might have to babysit haha soo yeah that saves me from going to watch themm lol

aghhh i hate packin and i gotta be outta this dorm by april 30.. and i move into the other dorm may 1st til the end of june.. but yeah i am also lookin for a part-time job that doesnt pay $6 to $7.00 gahh lol soo much workkkkk to get done lol so lil time =( mehh OoO i am gettin my net cut off soon so i wont be online for a biut cuz i gotta change my address to my new dorm room soo yeah i dunno how long that will take hopefully it will be fast not like when i first got here and had to wait a month.. aghhh that was helll lol but yeah thats all i got to say for now....

What Kind of Seducer Are You?
Your Seduction Style: Au Natural
You rank up there with your seduction skills, though you might not know it. That's because you're a natural at seduction. You don't realize your power! The root of your natural seduction power: your innocence and optimism. You're the type of person who happily plays around and creates a unique little world. Little do you know that your personal paradise is so appealing that it sucks people in. You find joy in everything - so is it any surprise that people find joy in you? You bring back the inner child in everyone you meet with your sincere and spontaneous ways. Your childlike (but not childish) behavior also inspires others to care for you. As a result, those who you befriend and date tend to be incredibly loyal to you.
Your Love Life Secrets, Revealed
Your Love Life Secrets Are
Looking back on your life, you will have a few true loves. You're a little scarred from your past relationships, but who isn't? You expect a lot from your lover - you want the full package. You tend to be very picky. In fights, you speak your mind and don't hold back. You know you're right, and you can get quite angry about it. You Are 80% Boyish and 20% Girlish

I'm So into you

It's the way that right after we finish talking, I wanna call you right back.

It's the way you can make me laugh without even knowing I've been crying all night.

It's the way I pretend to not want you when it's so fucking obvious.

It's the way I knew I was going to fall for you the second I met you.

It's the way I stay up all night long thinking about you.

It's the way my heart stops whenever I'm in the same room as you.

It's the way I'm crushed when we don't see each other for more than a day.

It's th way I can never be truly mad at you for over 5 minutes.

It's the way you make me feel like a princess whenever we lock eyes, even if it's just for a moment.

It's the way I go crazy inside when I make you laugh. Gosh, I love how you laugh.

It's the way I never think I'm beautiful enough for you;not even close.

It's the way that you tell me how beautiful I am..

It's the way I wait for you to IM me, because my pride wont allow me to IM you and appear even the slightest bit desperate.

It's the way your gorgeous blue eyes look at me.

It's the way that whenever I'm around other guys, the only thing I see is your face.

It's the way I know that if you ever read this you will automactically know it's about you.

It's the way you can make me stay up til 3 am on a school night because you want someone to talk to.

It's the way that the thought of us together makes all of my problems disappear.

It's the way I repeat and replay in my heard every moment we share over and over again.

It's the way you're the only person on my buddy list who has their own sections.

It's the way that every song I listen to somehow relates to you.

It's the way I will stay up until 4 am just because you might sign on.

Its the way you smell; even when you swear you're not wearing cologne.

It's the way I hate butterflies in my stomach,but when you give them to me they're all right.

It's the way we both know the truth, but no one dares say anythign.

It's the way I try to impress you and come off as more of an idiot than I already am.

It's the way I just want to punch you in your perfect face for always being able to say the right things at exactly the right time.

It's the way you're the only person on my buddy list with his own buddy alert that moo's whenever you sign on.

It's the way I feel whenever I think about you with anyone other than me.

It's the way we argue over the stupidest shit and get in pretend fights just because we can.

It's the way my body went completely numb when we touched for the first time...

It's the way I hate going to the movies with you, because it's pure torture to sit next to you pretending to watch the movie while, in reality, I'm trying to remember how to breathe every time out elbows touch on the armrest.

It's the way I know, even as I write this, that I will never work up enough courage to give this to you..

It's the way you're so smart, yet so fucking oblivious.

Love isn't just butterflies; dammit. It's the way I feel every time I look into your eyes. Yeah, it's the way your hand fits perfectly into mine...<3333
